game.name: Moon and Fang
game.categories: Single-player, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Unite the strength of the Vampires and the Werewolves and combine their defenses in a unlikely alliance to defend from the humans. Select your moves between playing cards, earning coins or unlocking stronger decks to survive their rampage. Choose your desired rewards and build unique decks!
